questions.question_text: When moving a homepage or dashboard between instances, what must you remember?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Dont be fooled... Dashboards amd homepages are not included

Selected Answer: D
D- correct as you have to add them manually. There is another question where they ask what is not included as part of a standard update set and homepages are not.

Possibly D
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-platform-user-interface/page/administer/homepage-administration/task/t_AddAHomepageToAnUpdateSetAndApp.html

choices.B: They cannot be moved via update set
choices.C: The Platform will automatically add them to the update set
choices.D: Manually add them to the update set
choices.A: Download both as PDF and XML files

questions.question_text: Which type of scripts run in the browser?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A- UI Policies are run on the client - SNAF page 434.

Selected Answer: B
B. Relationships

ServiceNow allows you to establish relationships between different configuration items, such as servers and services. By defining relationships, you can create a map of dependencies, and this helps in understanding the impact of changes and tracing connections between various elements in your infrastructure.

questions.question_text: What enables you to trace the connection from an infrastructure item, like a Server, to the Services that are dependent on that Server?
